section.title: Past simple questions (wh- questions)
section.sectiontitle: In the Past simple question form, we use: question word + did + I/you/he/she/it/we/they + verb.
section.text2: Present: What do you do in the evenings?
section.sectiontitle2: Remember – you don't use did in Past simple questions with was and were.

section.title: Past simple questions
section.sectiontitle: For yes/no questions in the Past simple, we use: Did + I/you/he/she/it/we/they + verb.
section.sectiontitle2: We reply to yes/no questions with a short answer: Yes, I/you/he/she/it/we/they did or, No, I/you/he/she/it/we/they didn't.
section.text3: Did she stay in a hotel in Moscow? Yes, she did.
section.text3a: Did they like the art gallery? No, they didn't.
